website_summaries.verdict: Elegant, glamorous, and fun, these slender candles are worth it by themselves, but the inclusion of several shimmering sprinkles is the icing on the cake.
pros: Includes 12 metallic gold and 12 white candles, several types of gold and white sprinkles, and gold sugar pearls
cons: A little on the pricy side

customer_reviews.title: Classy and chic
customer_reviews.text: This little set is everything I need to decorate a beautiful batch of cupcakes. It’s got gorgeous white pearled, traditional, sprinkles as well as gold and white sugar spheres and sprinkles. There are four topping options total and they are all stunning! The gold toppings have a metallic shimmer while the white toppings have a shiny pearled appearance. This set is the perfect addition to any bakers kitchen. The candles are slender, tall and last a little under an hour when burned all the way through, but you won’t have them lit that long. My cupcakes will be classy and chic. I highly recommend this Wilton decoration set!
customer_reviews.author: Bria

customer_reviews.title: Really really pretty in person!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set for my wife - here’s what she had to say: Wilton is a name we’ve all trusted for decades. When you hear their name, you immediately think of baking. 😁 I could try to describe the sprinkles and candy balls, but I believe a picture is worth 1,000 words, so I added some! The photos don’t do these decorations justice. They look amazing in person - especially the white sprinkles - the light catches them and they sparkle! Oh, they taste good, too! That’s always a plus! Get yours today - you’ll love them! Happy Bakinf!
customer_reviews.author: NJD & DMD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the child who loves gold gold gold!
customer_reviews.text: This came just in time for my little friend’s 6th birthday. He is absolutely in love with gold. Gold. Gold. Gold. His hair is golden. He is a sunny little guy. And every brown rock he picks up he is convinced is gold! So when he told me he would love to have gold candles, I had just the thing. He gasped when he saw them. “So beautiful!” And I had to persuade him not to dump ALL the sprinkles and beads on one cake. Nice quality and very pretty
customer_reviews.author: Gina Pera, Adult ADHD Expert and Author

customer_reviews.title: Upscale decorations!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking to up your decorating game, this is your set to purchase. Could be used for ANY type of party, anniversary, birthday, etc. The colors are gold, white, pearl and are something you'd find at an upscale bakery. Plenty decorations for more than one party. More a set for an adult, but, could certainly be used for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Ginger S

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant
customer_reviews.text: I.love this decorating kit lovely tall small tapered gold and white candles gold and white sprinkles and dragees. Perfect for birthday, anniversary, other celebrations. A generous amount of sprinkles.unless your grandchildren get a hold of them whilst unsupervised. They did leave enough for a more modest than planned decorated star cake and it was a snag hit. I.plan to get this set before Christmas too, I would not have needed to.buy more sprinkles of the kids had not eaten them.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Jentoft

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This Wilton set for birthday splendor is indeed a joy. You get all the makings for many items or to do it up on one cake. I have a best friend I adore and had a cake that I overflowed with these decadent and glorious decorations. She was so touched and overjoyed. These are all quality products from the sprinkles to the candles and uses are endless. Any event or occasion becomes more special with this set. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: barry

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: Can candles be elegant? I think yes! At least this Wilton set can. I really love the gold accent of this birthday set. The set came with two sets of tall candles, in white and gold of course. It also included one whole container of gold sugar pearls and another with gold and white assortment of sprinkles. These work perfectly for my bestie's upcoming 40th party and go great with her black and gold theme.
customer_reviews.author: Mira Y

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter's birthday as gold is her favorite color. I thought this looked nice but when it arrived as was impressed as how great it was. There are enough supplies for several cakes! There is a wonderful variety of sprinkles and such to make any cake shine. The candles are nice and long and look very elegant. I am so impressed I would get this again for many occasions.
customer_reviews.author: my2cents

customer_reviews.title: Bake a Cake for That Special Day
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice kit for the baker in your life. Whether it's you or someone special in your life. Someone's birthday, anniversary, or whatever the occasion, you get long candles (white and gold) and sprinkles. It's a really nice set you will be able to use on more than one occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Golds Don't Match!!
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I'm just being petty but the gold in the sprinkles are a yellow toned gold and the candles are a copperplate gold and they don't match!! That is very annoying to me. In my opinion the copperplate gold is more aesthetically appealing and it goes with a lot of the gold themes these days.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Elevate Your Cake
customer_reviews.text: Wilton is a good company whose products i have used in the past with great success. This set arrived just in time to use on my birthday cake. The set is very classy colors for candles and sprinkles perfect for an adult birthday. There is enough left over for other occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Henley

customer_reviews.title: Super cute set
customer_reviews.text: I had a gold themed party for my mother in law that I was helping to plan so I thought this little set would go perfectly. We used the gold sprinkles on the cupcakes and the gold candles on her cake. The little golden pearl balls were actually used as part of the table decoration. We just sort of sprinkled the gold pearls across the table to add to the decor. It all turned out super cute and I think the price is very reasonable. I still had candles and sprinkles leftover afterwards too. This is the third set or product I've bought from Wilton and I've been extremely pleased with each and every one.
customer_reviews.author: K Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous occasion set
customer_reviews.text: This set is perfect for celebrating a special birthday in style. There are 4 different sprinkle types including pearly and sparkly, and the tall, slim candles add a touch of elegance. The first ingredient in the sprinkles is sugar and then a bunch of other ingredients but at least it's not an artificial sweetener as the top ingredient. At the time of this review the retail price was around $14 which is reasonable for this set of 12 tall white candles, 12 tall gold candles, golden ball sprinkles plus a 4-way divided sprinkle set.
customer_reviews.author: Jean K

customer_reviews.title: candles  have no holders
customer_reviews.text: The set is very pretty and makes wonderful cake decoration. The sprinkles do not have any tree nuts manufactured on the same equipment, yay! They so beautiful and so easy to decorate over plain white cake. The candles are tall and beautiful, but they did not include candle holders. I am not sure I want to stick a bare candle in a cake directly. I have hard time finding candle holders for birthday cakes lately, not to mention finding ones that would actually fit the candles.
customer_reviews.author: a customer

customer_reviews.title: Want A Cake Decorated With This Set?
customer_reviews.text: , Wilton Golden Birthday Candles and Sprinkles Set, 4 Piece, look so elegant in the photos. I doubt my cake would look so good but this set gives me a chance to try. I do have a few other cake decorating supplies that would make a wonderful cake. I especially like the candles, they are so elegant looking and would add beautifully to a cake. It's just too hot to bake right now, 100+, but do plan to do this in the fall. Not expensive either.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Recommended item
customer_reviews.text: This set is everything you need to beautifully decorate your cakes, cupcakes, and cookies. The coloring is positively beautiful and they have a nice consistency as well. The price for the kit is big savings as compared to buying it all separately and the colors are well matched to do a lot of pretty things. They made my cupcakes so pretty I hated to let everyone eat them.. oh and these candles burn a lot longer than the candles in the pack I had in my cupboard. 4 stars!
customer_reviews.author: LifePathin4D

customer_reviews.title: Cake-Decorating Made Easy
customer_reviews.text: Even if you're all thumbs when it comes to cake decorating--like I am--this set makes a special cake easy. It includes two dozen tall slender candles in gold and white, a generous container of "gold pearls" and four kinds of jimmies and sprinkles. Looks five on either chocolate or vanilla frosting. I made a special layer cake for my daughter-in-law's birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Word Lover

customer_reviews.title: Amazing set!
customer_reviews.text: This set comes with 12 golden and 12 white long candles, gold sugar pearl sprinkles 4.8 oz and gold mix sprinkles 3.8 oz with four types of sprinkles of different size and shape. They would make any cake look absolutely beautiful. I am going to use the heck out of them for my daughter's ninth BD party! Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Gerbera_Reads

customer_reviews.title: Decorate beautifully
customer_reviews.text: This set is fabulous for any elegant cake decorating you need to do. The candies taste good and the gold and white candles are elegant. I recommend this set. It'll help you decorate beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie and Heather Hejduk

customer_reviews.title: Fancy
customer_reviews.text: I used these candles and sprinkles on my significant others birthday cake about a week ago. These things were a nice elegant touch.
customer_reviews.author: IAmanonymous

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: These are a nice set for a really elegant party or shower. Great metallic/white color scheme.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver DeMille, TJEd

product_meta.title: Wilton Golden Birthday Candles and Sprinkles Set, 4-Piece
product_meta.description: Add some glamor to your next birthday cake with this candles and sprinkles set. Each set comes with a mix of gold and white sprinkles, sugar Pearls, nonpareils, sanding sugars and jimmies, plus long and lean white and gold wax candles. Creating a beautiful cake is fast and easy when you have these gorgeous cake decorating supplies on hand. The candles add dramatic height and the sprinkles add shimmering elegance to any ordinary birthday cake. Great for 50th Birthday parties, anniversaries, and other golden celebrations!
feature_bullets: Whether you’re celebrating a golden birthday or you just want to give your ordinary cake some glamor, this cake decorating set makes it fast and easy to get that luxe look that takes your party to the next level
Includes: 12 tall gold birthday candle, 12 tall white birthday candle, pearlized gold sprinkles asssortment and gold sugar Pearls
Net Weight: gold sprinkles assortment: 3. 8 oz. (110 g); gold sugar Pearls: 4. 8 oz. (136 g); gold candle 12-count, white candle 12-count
Sprinkles made in a facility that processes wheat, gold sugar Pearls are certified Kosher, Made in a facility that also processes soy
Gold sugar Pearls made in the USA
In order to help cut down on extra packaging waste, each individual product in your set will arrive together in the same plain brown box

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars31 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
